article_title: Reading Republican will challenge Pitts in primary
article_text: Karen Shuey is a Lancaster Newspapers staff writer who covers state and federal government and politics. She can be reached at kshuey@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8716. You can also follow @Karen_Shuey on Twitter.

article_metadata.author: KAREN SHUEY | Staff Writer

og.description: The political landscape is changing. Controversial issues like same-sex marriage and marijuana legalization are evolving and public opinion is starting to lean a little to the left.
